#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int i;
char c[100000],k;
scanf("%s",&c);
for(i=0;i<strlen(c);i++)
{
if(c[i]=='X')
std::cout<<"A";
else if(c[i]=='Y')
std::cout<<"B";
else if(c[i]=='Z')
std::cout<<"C";
else
{
k=c[i]+3;
std::cout<<k;
}




}









}
